languages.text: Each stack reduces Armour and Dodge by -5%

traits.locale_text: Each stack reduces Armour and Dodge by -5%

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} are reduced by −5% for each stack of this effect.
languages.original_text: Каждый уровень эффекта уменьшает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} на 5%.

traits.locale_text: Armour and dodge are reduced by −5% for each stack of this effect.

languages.text: Каждый уровень эффекта уменьшает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} на 5%.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} are reduced by −5% for each stack of this effect.

languages.text: Bu etkinin her birikimi için {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} değerleri %5 azalır.

traits.locale_text: Bu etkinin her birikimi için {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} değerleri %5 azalır.

languages.text: La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} se reducen en un −5 % por cada acumulación de este efecto.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} are reduced by −5% for each stack of this effect.

traits.locale_text: La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} se reducen en un −5 % por cada acumulación de este efecto.

languages.text: 每层效果使{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}降低5%。

languages.text: L'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Armure{/g} et l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Esquive{/g} sont réduites de −5 % par cumul de cet effet.
